item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Thoughts
item.description: Stealth Gameplay My favourite way to play has definitely been stealth with the mixture of hacking and tech being incredibly satisfying and fits a unique power fantasy I haven’t experienced elsewhere. Being able control the battlefield by hacking things like door and explosives, or just zapping enemies on command, adds an almost sandbox like environment for the player to interact with. There’s also the satisfying choice of weaponry from silenced pistols and rifles to melee weapons
